<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_ui_policy"><catalog_ui_policy action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>true</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>item</applies_to><catalog_conditions>IO:c79eb44e47f3611098f58977536d4373=perm_address^EQ</catalog_conditions><catalog_item display_value="Newly Onboarded Employees' Details">110bc57147b7211098f58977536d43b2</catalog_item><conditions/><description/><global>true</global><inherit>false</inherit><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><model_id/><model_table/><on_load>true</on_load><order>100</order><reverse_if_false>true</reverse_if_false><run_scripts>false</run_scripts><script_false><![CDATA[function onCondition() 
{
	g_form.setDisplay('current_address_details',true);
	g_form.setMandatory('current_address_details',true);
	var val2 = g_form.getValue('current_address_details');
	g_form.setValue('current_address_details', val2, val2);
}]]></script_false><script_true><![CDATA[function onCondition() 
{
	var val = g_form.getValue('perm_address');
	g_form.setDisplay('current_address_details',false);
	g_form.setValue('current_address_details', val, val);
	
}]]></script_true><set_values/><short_description>Show/Hide Current Address Details field.</short_description><sys_class_name>catalog_ui_policy</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-07-04 13:23:08</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>6842ca0a473b611098f58977536d432a</sys_id><sys_mod_count>4</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Show/Hide Current Address Details field.</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_ui_policy_6842ca0a473b611098f58977536d432a</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-07-05 09:04:10</sys_updated_on><table/><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set/><view/></catalog_ui_policy></record_update>
